contacts.name: David Liu
contacts.title: Professor / HHMI Investigator
contacts.expertise: Prime editing inventor, dual-AAV delivery systems for CNS
contacts.relevance: Invented prime editing itself. Lab actively solving delivery of prime editors to CNS via split-intein AAV. Co-founded Prime Medicine.
contacts.intro_path: Via Dr. Miner (they likely know each other through prime editing work) or Broad Institute directory

contacts.name: Daniel Siegwart
contacts.title: Professor of Biochemistry
contacts.expertise: SORT LNP platform — organ-specific lipid nanoparticle targeting including brain
contacts.relevance: Pioneered redirecting LNPs to brain, lung, spleen instead of liver. SORT technology could enable IV-administered brain-targeted delivery of prime editor mRNA.
contacts.intro_path: Direct academic outreach or via UT Southwestern dept of biochemistry

contacts.name: Feng Zhang
contacts.title: Professor / HHMI Investigator
contacts.expertise: Engineered virus-like particles (eVLPs) for gene editor delivery
contacts.relevance: eVLPs deliver pre-formed Cas9/prime editor RNP complexes with tissue targeting. Founded Aera Therapeutics to commercialize. Non-viral, transient delivery.
contacts.intro_path: Via Broad Institute or through Aera Therapeutics

contacts.name: Frank Bennett
contacts.title: Chief Scientific Officer (Franchise)
contacts.expertise: ASO therapeutics — CNS delivery, allele-specific knockdown, intrathecal delivery
contacts.relevance: World leader in ASO development. Led Spinraza (SMA), tofersen (ALS). Extensive intrathecal CNS delivery experience. Could develop TREX1-targeting ASO.
contacts.intro_path: Ionis medical/scientific affairs or warm intro via neurology research community
contacts.notes: ASO route — complementary to prime editing, not competing

contacts.name: Timothy Miller
contacts.title: Professor of Neurology
contacts.expertise: ASO development for neurodegeneration, tofersen for ALS
contacts.relevance: Bridges neurology clinical practice with ASO development. WashU is also an RVCL research center (Dr. Andria Ford). Could connect RVCL and ASO worlds.
contacts.intro_path: Via Dr. Miner or Dr. Andria Ford (WashU RVCL connection)

contacts.name: Don Cleveland
contacts.title: Distinguished Professor
contacts.expertise: ASO approaches for neurodegenerative diseases, allele-specific knockdown
contacts.relevance: Pioneered ASO strategies for SOD1-ALS. Close Ionis collaborator. Deep expertise in allele-specific CNS ASOs.
contacts.intro_path: Direct academic outreach or via Ionis connection

contacts.name: Business Development
contacts.title: Partnerships / BD Team
contacts.expertise: Prime editing therapeutics — commercializing David Liu's technology
contacts.relevance: The company literally built to bring prime editing to patients. Natural partner for Miner lab's RVCL prime editor. CNS programs in development.
contacts.intro_path: BD inquiry via website, or warm intro through David Liu / Broad network
contacts.notes: Publicly traded (PRME). Check their pipeline for CNS programs.

contacts.name: Business Development
contacts.title: Partnerships / BD Team
contacts.expertise: In vivo LNP-delivered CRISPR — first FDA-approved in vivo gene editing therapy
contacts.relevance: Most advanced non-viral CRISPR delivery platform. Proven in humans (liver). Expanding to CNS and other organs. LNP expertise directly applicable to RVCL multi-organ delivery.
contacts.intro_path: Medical affairs or BD inquiry. Could also approach via Jennifer Doudna network.

contacts.name: Business Development
contacts.title: Partnerships / BD Team
contacts.expertise: TRACER AAV capsid platform — brain-penetrant AAV after IV administration
contacts.relevance: Engineered AAV capsids that cross BBB from IV dosing. Partnered with Pfizer and Novartis for CNS delivery. Could carry prime editor payload to brain vasculature.
contacts.intro_path: BD inquiry via website. Pfizer/Novartis partnerships may complicate but worth exploring.

contacts.name: Business Development
contacts.title: Partnerships / BD Team
contacts.expertise: CNS-focused gene therapy — AAV delivery to brain
contacts.relevance: Entire company focused on CNS gene therapy delivery. AAV-based platform designed for brain penetration.
contacts.notes: Publicly traded (PASG). Based in Philadelphia — same city as Miner/UPenn.

contacts.name: Business Development
contacts.title: Partnerships / BD Team
contacts.expertise: Transport Vehicle (TV) platform — transferrin receptor-mediated BBB crossing
contacts.relevance: Proven BBB crossing technology using engineered antibodies that hijack transferrin receptor transcytosis. Could be adapted to carry LNPs or gene editing cargo across BBB.
contacts.intro_path: BD inquiry via website. Partnered with Biogen.
contacts.notes: Publicly traded (DNLI). BBB transport technology is modular.

contacts.name: Business Development
contacts.title: Partnerships / BD Team
contacts.expertise: Engineered virus-like particles (eVLPs) for non-viral gene editor delivery
contacts.relevance: Feng Zhang spinout. Delivers pre-formed RNP complexes — transient editing, tissue-targetable, redosable. Non-viral alternative to AAV.
contacts.intro_path: Via Feng Zhang or direct BD inquiry
contacts.notes: Early stage. Series A funded. Novel platform.

contacts.name: Business Development
contacts.title: Partnerships / BD Team
contacts.expertise: ASO platform — broadest ASO pipeline in the world
contacts.relevance: If pursuing ASO approach alongside prime editing. Proven CNS delivery (intrathecal). Proven allele-specific knockdown. Could develop TREX1 ASO program.
contacts.intro_path: Medical/scientific affairs or via Frank Bennett
contacts.notes: Publicly traded (IONS). Carlsbad, CA. Has rare disease programs.
